TEXT: A prodigious magician turns to the Spire in her search for the El-Crystals. NL Mastery over the elements, the occult and raw magic itself will assist her on her journey.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Please~ ~don't~ ~hurt~ ~us,~ ~we~ ~come~ ~in~ ~peace."~
